execution_plan.description: Find product groups where the number of inactive items (active <> 'Y') is greater than the number of active items by aggregating items per group and filtering.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_groups.gid AS s1__gid, product_groups.group_name AS s1__group_name, SUM(CASE WHEN items.active <> 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS s1__inactive_count, SUM(CASE WHEN items.active = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS s1__active_count FROM product_groups LEFT JOIN items ON items.group_ref = product_groups.gid GROUP BY product_groups.gid, product_groups.group_name HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN items.active <> 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > SUM(CASE WHEN items.active = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END);
